item.title: Email sent to Adam ROGALSKI (State Department, FBI) and Mahonri MANJARREZ (FBI) in which I give examples of the serious frauds the transnational criminal enterprise McDonald’s Corporation and/or its affiliated companies committed.
item.description:
Key point of this event: the F.B.I. is now formally notified of some of the crimes I am accusing McDonald’s Corporation and/or its subsidiary companies of.

On 2022-03-11, I sent 3 emails to the F.B.I.

This is the third email which was sent at 19:38 Beijing time. It was sent to Messrs. Rogalski and Manjarrez.

From: [Victim/key witness/whistleblower’s name, redacted for privacy] (Visit X-v-France.com for more information on who I am.)

TO : [Mr. Rogalski’s username]@state.gov

TO : [Mr. Manjarrez’s username]@fbi.gov

SUBJECT: 3 concrete examples of aggravated frauds

item.title: Chris KEMPCZINSKI
item.description: For the sake of transparency, I will publish some of my communications to Mr. Kempczinski on the website Kempczinski.com.

item.title: Notification to McDonald’s executives Gloria Santona, Steve Easterbrook, and Malcolm Hicks
item.description: From: [Victim/key witness/whistleblower’s name, redacted for privacy] (Visit X-v-France.com for more information on who I am.) SUBJECT: defamation against my consumer protection websites DATE: December 8, 2016 at 00:05 (Beijing time +0800) TO : Gloria.Santona@us.mcd.com, Steve.Easterbrook@us.mcd.com, Malcolm.Hicks@eu.mcd.com I forgot to mention… As for me, I am going to file a lawsuit against “X” (but targeting McDonald’s) for, among other things, defamation. Indeed, it seems some of your executives were behind some defamatory comment against my websites.

item.title: PLEASE STOP THE FRAUD!
item.description: From: [Victim/key witness/whistleblower’s name, redacted for privacy] (Visit X-v-France.com for more information on who I am.) Subject: please stop the fraud! Date sent: 2015-10-30 at 22:25 (Beijing time +0800) To: Steve Easterbrook, Gloria Santona, Malcolm Hicks Dear Mr. Easterbrook, dear Ms. Santona, and dear Mr. Hicks, I repeat again. Please stop the fraud. You must make it stop! I know you know this “game” is a fraud under European laws. You can not possibly be so stupid not to understand except if you don’t understand on purpose so that you can later claim plausible deniability.

item.title: Additional frauds; email sent to McDonald’s General Counsel CCed to McDonald’s CEO
item.description: From: [Victim/key witness/whistleblower’s name, redacted for privacy] (Visit X-v-France.com for more information on who I am.) TO : Gloria.Santona@us.mcd.com CC : Steve.Easterbrook@us.mcd.com SUBJECT: additional frauds Ms Santona, Thank you for answering me. Could you please make sure the French team communicate with me by email? Normal mail takes forever for me to receive now that I live in China and I am not going to wait one month to act if there is an ongoing fraud.

item.title: Reply from Gloria Santona, General Counsel of McDonald’s Corporation
item.description: KEY POINT OF THIS EVENT: By acknowledging that McDonald’s Corporation executives “take such inquiries seriously”, McDonald’s Corporation can’t claim plausible deniability anymore. Furthermore, the email from Ms. Santona who is the General Counsel of McDonald’s Corporation is CCed to the CEO of McDonald’s Corporation Steve Easterbrook. From: Gloria.Santona@us.mcd.com Subject: : update Date received：2015-10-21 23:47 (Beijing time +0800) To: [Victim/key witness/whistleblower’s name, redacted for privacy] (Visit X-v-France.com for more information on who I am.) Cc: Steve.Easterbrook@us.mcd.com

item.title: Email sent to Gloria Santona, General Counsel of McDonald’s Corporation, requesting an update
item.description: Ms. Santona, I would like to give a friendly reminder that I gave McDonald’s a deadline of October 22nd 2015 midnight GMT time. So you have about 36 hours left. It was 4 entire days which is more than enough considering I’ve sent my first cease and desist letter back in 2012. On top of this, had I known that the French branch had started scamming people again, I would have at the time only given you 24 to 48 hours.

item.description: From: [Victim/key witness/whistleblower’s name, redacted for privacy] (Visit X-v-France.com for more information on who I am.) Subject: Accessory after the facts Date sent:: October 21, 2015 at 12:33 (Beijing time +0800) To:: Gloria.Santona@us.mcd.com Cc:: Steve.Easterbrook@us.mcd.com, Robert.Gibbs@us.mcd.com, Silvia.Lagnado@us.mcd.com, Kevin.Ozan@us.mcd.com, Jim.Sappington@us.mcd.com, Mike.Andres@us.mcd.com, Nawfal.TRABELSI@fr.mcd.com, Isabelle.KUSTER@fr.mcd.com, Alexis.BOURDON@fr.mcd.com, Hubert.MONGON@fr.mcd.com, Christophe.CHAPUIS@fr.mcd.com, Xavier.ROYAUX@fr.mcd.com, Francoise.deBorda@fr.mcd.com Dear Ms. Santona, I am surprised that the French website carrying the fraud hasn’t been taken down yet. I do believe that the U.S. executive team can legally be held responsible and be accessory after the facts for this massive fraud.

item.title: Fraud of the century: emails to McDonald’s executives
item.description: From: [Victim/key witness/whistleblower’s name, redacted for privacy] (Visit X-v-France.com for more information on who I am.) SUBJECT: Fraud of the century DATE: October 20, 2015 at 03:13 (Beijing time +0800) TO: Gloria SANTONA CC: Steve EASTERBROOK, Robert.Gibbs@us.mcd.com, Silvia.Lagnado@us.mcd.com, Kevin.Ozan@us.mcd.com, Jim.Sappington@us.mcd.com, Mike.Andres@us.mcd.com Ms. Santona, First of all, I want to thank you for having taken my phone call today without hanging up on me right away. Your counter-part in France, Mme de Borda, always refused to communicate with me through phone.
